technologies.name: WordPress
technologies.description: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database. Features include a plugin architecture and a template system.

technologies.name: MySQL
technologies.description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: MUI
technologies.description: MUI(formerly Material UI) is a simple and customisable component library to build faster, beautiful, and more accessible React applications.

technologies.name: Amazon Web Services
technologies.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a comprehensive cloud services platform offering compute power, database storage, content delivery and other functionality.

technologies.name: AddToAny Share Buttons
technologies.description: AddToAny Share Buttons plugin for WordPress increases traffic and engagement by helping people share your posts and pages to any service.

technologies.name: Contact Form 7
technologies.description: Contact Form 7 is an WordPress plugin which can manage multiple contact forms. The form supports Ajax-powered submitting, CAPTCHA, Akismet spam filtering.

technologies.name: React
technologies.description: React is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

technologies.name: Yoast SEO
technologies.description: Yoast SEO is a search engine optimisation plugin for WordPress and other platforms.

technologies.name: Emotion
technologies.description: Emotion is a library designed for writing CSS styles with JavaScript.

technologies.name: Nginx
technologies.description: Nginx is a web server that can also be used as a reverse proxy, load balancer, mail proxy and HTTP cache.

technologies.name: Cloudflare
technologies.description: Cloudflare is a web-infrastructure and website-security company, providing content-delivery-network services, DDoS mitigation, Internet security, and distributed domain-name-server services.

technologies.name: WPML
technologies.description: WPML plugin makes it possible to build and run fully multilingual WordPress sites.

technologies.name: Moove GDPR Consent
technologies.description: Moove GDPR Consent is a GDPR Cookie Compliance plugin for Wordpress.

technologies.name: WordPress Multisite
technologies.description: A multisite network is a collection of sites that all share the same WordPress installation core files.

technologies.name: Google Tag Manager
technologies.description: Google Tag Manager is a tag management system (TMS) that allows you to quickly and easily update measurement codes and related code fragments collectively known as tags on your website or mobile app.

technologies.name: AddToAny
technologies.description: AddToAny is a universal sharing platform that can be integrated into a website by use of a web widget or plugin.

technologies.name: Modernizr
technologies.description: Modernizr is a JavaScript library that detects the features available in a user's browser.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: jQuery Migrate
technologies.description: Query Migrate is a javascript library that allows you to preserve the compatibility of your jQuery code developed for versions of jQuery older than 1.9.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Priority Hints
technologies.description: Priority Hints exposes a mechanism for developers to signal a relative priority for browsers to consider when fetching resources.

technologies.name: Font Awesome
technologies.description: Font Awesome is a font and icon toolkit based on CSS and Less.

technologies.name: cdnjs
technologies.description: cdnjs is a free distributed JS library delivery service.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Amazon S3
technologies.description: Amazon S3 or Amazon Simple Storage Service is a service offered by Amazon Web Services (AWS) that provides object storage through a web service interface.

technologies.name: RSS
technologies.description: RSS is a family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works—such as blog entries, news headlines, audio, and video—in a standardized format.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.
